definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: People will be able to use the videophone for conferences.
sentences.chinese: 人們將能利用可視電話來開會。

sentences.english: In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
sentences.chinese: 在將來，採辦東西能在可視電話中進行。

sentences.english: Application and testing results in the videophone system have been given in the text.
sentences.chinese: 並給出了在可視電話系統中的應用及測試結果。

sentences.english: In the future, shopping can be done by videophone.
sentences.chinese: 在將來，購買東西能在可視電話中進行。
突然，你手錶上的可視電話響了。
